ing: 3 cups whole wheat rotini pasta, cooked, rinsed and cooled
4 cups loosely packed baby spinach leaves
1 cup KRAFT Canada Tex Mex Cheese Light
des: "Give pasta salad a flavourful twist with this easy-to-make whole wheat pasta salad that has fresh spinach, black beans and tomato."
ins:
Mix first 4 ingredients in large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly.
